snippet: Dominic Smith’s parents always wanted better things for their son, a left-handed-hitting first baseman who recently signed a $2.6 million contract with the Mets.
abstract: Profile of Dominic Smith, first baseman who recently signed a $2.6 million contract with New York Mets; Smith's expresses well-founded incredulity about being drafted, given that he is African-American and grew up in a neighborhood of south Los Angeles from which youth programs for low-income families have dried to a trickle; African-Americans accounted for only 8.5 percent of major league roster spots on opening day 2013.
lead_paragraph: Dominic Smith’s parents always wanted better things for their son, a left-handed-hitting first baseman who recently signed a $2.6 million contract with the Mets.

headline.main: A New Life for the Mets Prospect Dominic Smith
headline.print_headline: New Life for a New Met
